00024 float Clock::calculateElapsedTime(void) {
00025 
00026         unsigned long currentTime = clock();
00027 
00028         float cps = CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00029         float timePassed = ((float)(currentTime - Clock::m_lastTime)) / cps;
00030 
00031 
00032         Clock::m_lastTime = currentTime;
00033 
00034         return timePassed;
00035 }
